00060 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 //  ENUM : sc_enc
00062 //
00063 //  Enumeration of sign encodings.
00064 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 
00066 enum sc_enc
00067 {
00068     SC_TC_,     // two's complement
00069     SC_US_      // unsigned
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 SC_API const std::string to_string( sc_enc );
00074 
00075 
00076 inline
00077 ::std::ostream&
00078 operator << ( ::std::ostream& os, sc_enc enc )
00079 {
00080     return os << to_string( enc );
00081 }

00084 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 //  ENUM : sc_q_mode
00086 //
00087 //  Enumeration of quantization modes.
00088 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 
00090 enum sc_q_mode
00091 {
00092     SC_RND,             // rounding to plus infinity
00093     SC_RND_ZERO,        // rounding to zero
00094     SC_RND_MIN_INF,     // rounding to minus infinity
00095     SC_RND_INF,         // rounding to infinity
00096     SC_RND_CONV,        // convergent rounding
00097     SC_TRN,             // truncation
00098     SC_TRN_ZERO         // truncation to zero
00099 };
00100 
00101 
00102 SC_API const std::string to_string( sc_q_mode );
00103 
00104 
00105 inline
00106 ::std::ostream&
00107 operator << ( ::std::ostream& os, sc_q_mode q_mode )
00108 {
00109     return os << to_string( q_mode );
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 //  ENUM : sc_o_mode
00115 //
00116 //  Enumeration of overflow modes.
00117 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00118 
00119 enum sc_o_mode
00120 {
00121     SC_SAT,             // saturation
00122     SC_SAT_ZERO,        // saturation to zero
00123     SC_SAT_SYM,         // symmetrical saturation
00124     SC_WRAP,            // wrap-around (*)
00125     SC_WRAP_SM          // sign magnitude wrap-around (*)
00126 };
00127 
00128 // (*) uses the number of saturated bits argument, see the documentation.
00129 
00130 
00131 SC_API const std::string to_string( sc_o_mode );
00132 
00133 
00134 inline
00135 ::std::ostream&
00136 operator << ( ::std::ostream& os, sc_o_mode o_mode )
00137 {
00138     return os << to_string( o_mode );
00139 }

00246 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00247 //  Dedicated error reporting and checking.
00248 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00249 
00250 #define SC_ERROR_IF_IMPL_(cnd,id,msg)                                         \
00251   do {                                                                        \
00252     if( cnd ) {                                                               \
00253         SC_REPORT_ERROR( id, msg );                                           \
00254         sc_core::sc_abort(); /* can't recover from here */                    \
00255     }                                                                         \
00256   } while( false )
00257 
00258 #ifdef DEBUG_SYSTEMC
00259 # define SC_ASSERT_(cnd,msg)                                                  \
00260     SC_ERROR_IF_IMPL_(!(cnd), sc_core::SC_ID_INTERNAL_ERROR_, msg )
00261 #else
00262 # define SC_ASSERT_(cnd,msg) (void(0))
00263 #endif
00264 
00265 #define SC_ERROR_IF_(cnd,id)                                                  \
00266     SC_ERROR_IF_IMPL_( cnd, id, 0 )
00267 
00268 #define SC_CHECK_WL_(wl)                                                      \
00269     SC_ERROR_IF_( (wl) <= 0, sc_core::SC_ID_INVALID_WL_ )
00270 
00271 #define SC_CHECK_N_BITS_(n_bits)                                              \
00272     SC_ERROR_IF_( (n_bits) < 0, sc_core::SC_ID_INVALID_N_BITS_ )
00273 
00274 #define SC_CHECK_DIV_WL_(div_wl)                                              \
00275     SC_ERROR_IF_( (div_wl) <= 0, sc_core::SC_ID_INVALID_DIV_WL_ )
00276 
00277 #define SC_CHECK_CTE_WL_(cte_wl)                                              \
00278     SC_ERROR_IF_( (cte_wl) <= 0, sc_core::SC_ID_INVALID_CTE_WL_ )
00279 
00280 #define SC_CHECK_MAX_WL_(max_wl)                                              \
00281     SC_ERROR_IF_( (max_wl) <= 0 && (max_wl) != -1,                            \
00282             sc_core::SC_ID_INVALID_MAX_WL_ )
00283 
00284 
00285 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 //  Generic observer macros.
00287 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00288 
00289 #define SC_OBSERVER_(object,observer_type,event)                              \
00290 {                                                                             \
00291     if( (object).observer() != 0 )                                            \
00292     {                                                                         \
00293         observer_type observer = (object).lock_observer();                    \
00294         observer->event( (object) );                                          \
00295         (object).unlock_observer( observer );                                 \
00296     }                                                                         \
00297 }
00298 
00299 #define SC_OBSERVER_DEFAULT_(observer_type)                                   \
00300 {                                                                             \
00301     if( m_observer == 0 && observer_type::default_observer != 0 )             \
00302         m_observer = (*observer_type::default_observer)();                    \
00303 }
